title: [CLIENT] Disconnects shortly after login - OR doesn't connect at all
body:
Hello,

Having issues with the game client. 
It either gets stuck at Authenticating and finally says an unexpected error has occurred etc etc.

OR it lets me login - lasts around 10 seconds before giving me the Trying to Reconnect box.

If I wait long enough it goes away and lets me queue.... Trying to Reconnect appears again after game finishes and client reloads.

Can not find any ongoing issues on Support pages?

Is this just me?

Thanks.

replies.body:
Seems I was just lucky for a couple of games. Got all the way through pregame for reconnect screen to pop up as the game started https://ibb.co/gf2Uh8

Really frustrating. Pls fix rito.
Mine seems all good now dude.

Hi everyone, we've reverted a change that may have caused this and it is looking like you should be able to log in again now. Still trying to gather more info about why this change caused this issue for some players. OCE was not the only region impacted.

Thanks for the reply, always appreciated to get response. 

And yes, I've stopped getting the error at the moment!

I have the exact same problem. It happened a few patches ago too, I uninstalled/reinstalled with hextech repair tool 999999 times  to no avail. Just tried that again now, no help. Restarted router, flushed DNS etc etc. Last time it fixed itself after a few days but my game was really buggy for a few more days. I hope this doesn't happen every patch.

Weird... hmm I tried all of that except the re-install. 
There aren't exactly heaps of comments here...

Update, I let the trying to reconnect screen roll for like ~15 minutes while I was looking for help on here and it just fixed itself. This happened last time with buggy ingame results and more connection issues, but I just got into a game of ARURF so far so good. Will update after game.
O really? I'm up to about 5 minutes now as I logged in while it is downloading/reinstalling haha so am sitting with that window open... I'll see if it works for me too. Thanks!

Game worked without connection problems but some aesthetic issues that I also got last game like really small chat box, summoner names, and icons. Game still playable though and those bugs fixed themselves after a few days. Unfortunately, as soon as the game ended I got the trying to reconnect screen again, I left it for about 5 minutes and it seems to be working again. Annoying but at least it looks like I can play.
Yes I'm the same. Mine worked - but each time game ends I have to wait for the Trying to Reconnect box... again.
